lines.text: Get your men under cover and don't fire until I give you the signal.
A whistling arrow warned the fur traders before they got into range. After that we could do nothing.
Bah! It's time we put a stop to these-these interuptions.
All the peons and the Indians think for sure that the stallion is a ghost horse and the rider an Indian spirit.
No spirit ever shot an arrow like this.
Christopher, eh? That's too long a name. We'll change that to... Kit. Why did you run away?
I just had to come West to be a scout, sir. I just hadda!
I see. What's your last name, Kit?
Isn't that what they call a Bowie knife?
It was entirely due to your help... and the rider of the Painted Stallion.
There's a story among the Commanche of a baby girl - the sole survivor of a massacred settlement.
Yes, and because of her golden hair, they worship her as a goddess. The goddess of peace - and she grew up with but one thought in mind... to preserve peace and prevent bloodshed
